explanation: [0-0] On a green lawn, a little girl in a pink short-sleeved shirt and blue shorts is sitting on a colorful blanket. Holding a yellow potato chip can in both hands, she closes her eyes and is about to put an orange potato chip into her mouth.

[0-7] The little girl puts the potato chip in her mouth and eats it. Then a hand passes a slice of watermelon to the little girl. The little girl pushes the watermelon away and continues to eat the potato chips. Then a hand reaches over and takes her can of potato chips away. The scene then switches to a young woman in a pink sweater sitting on a colorful blanket, holding the can of potato chips. She turns her head slightly to the right, frowning with a serious expression. Then she shakes her head and pours out the potato chips from the can.
